item.description: I MADE A RESERVATION FOR 8:00 pm with Roman, we will probably order one of their specialty pizza's. SHOW STARTS AT 10:00 this is a burlesque show in Bridgeport,surprising Roman for this Saturday night..if anyone is interested look up the website, order tickets,($15.00 online) ($20.00 at the door), table will be under my name (Meryl) kind of any early birthday surprise http://www.lilmisslixx.com.hostbaby.com/

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!
